title: Runway ML
description: Runway ML is an AI-powered platform that enables creatives to work with machine learning tools for video editing, image creation, and other visual media.
moreDetails: Runway ML offers tools like object detection, background removal, and real-time video editing. It integrates with creative workflows and supports a variety of AI models for video enhancement and text-to-image generation. Ideal for filmmakers, designers, and content creators.

title: DeepArt
description: DeepArt turns photos into artwork by applying the styles of famous artists using deep neural networks for style transfer.
moreDetails: The platform uses neural networks to transfer artistic styles to any image, creating unique pieces of art. It offers a range of artistic styles, from classical to modern art, ideal for photographers and artists.
nature: AI Art, Neural Networks, Style Transfer

title: Lumen5
description: Lumen5 is an AI-powered platform that transforms written content like blog posts into engaging videos with minimal effort.
moreDetails: Lumen5 automates video creation by converting text into visually appealing videos with AI-selected images, clips, and music. It is perfect for marketers, bloggers, and social media managers to create professional videos.

title: Artbreeder
description: Artbreeder uses AI to blend and evolve images, allowing users to create unique visuals by mixing and adjusting various image features.
moreDetails: Artbreeder leverages GANs to create new images by modifying and combining existing ones. Users can tweak specific features like facial attributes or landscapes to produce unique results.

title: D-ID
description: D-ID offers AI tools to animate still images and create lifelike avatars, perfect for personalized videos and marketing.
moreDetails: D-ID specializes in creating lifelike avatars and animations from photos using AI-powered video tools. It supports creating avatars with emotions and expressions.

title: FaceApp
description: FaceApp is an AI photo-editing tool that applies realistic transformations, such as age progression and gender swap, to facial images.
moreDetails: FaceApp offers a variety of realistic transformations like aging, gender swapping, and smile enhancement. It uses AI to modify facial features naturally.

title: Pikazo
description: Pikazo is an AI-based art generator that turns photos into unique works of art using neural networks and customizable styles.
moreDetails: Pikazo uses AI algorithms to apply different art styles to photos, creating visually stunning results. Users can select from a range of art styles to customize their images.

title: Animoto
description: Animoto is an AI-powered video creation tool that helps users quickly make marketing videos, slideshows, and social media content.
moreDetails: Animoto provides a drag-and-drop interface for video creation, where users upload images, video clips, and music, and the AI assembles them into polished videos.

title: Veed.io
description: Veed.io is an online video and audio editing platform with AI features like automatic captions, background noise removal, and text-to-speech.
moreDetails: Veed.io makes video and audio editing easy with AI-powered features. It automatically generates captions, removes noise, and includes text-to-speech capabilities for enhanced videos.

title: Prisma
description: Prisma is a popular AI photo-editing app that uses neural networks to apply artistic filters and effects to photos.
moreDetails: Prisma transforms photos into stunning works of art with deep learning and neural networks. It offers a variety of art styles, including effects based on famous artists like Picasso and Van Gogh.

title: Artisto
description: Artisto is an AI-powered video and photo editing app that turns your images and videos into artwork using deep learning techniques.
moreDetails: Artisto uses neural networks to turn videos and photos into artwork by applying artistic filters. It features various visual effects that transform ordinary footage into something unique.
nature: AI Video & Photo Editing, Artistic Effects

title: Shutterstock AI
description: Shutterstock offers AI-powered image editing tools to enhance photos, videos, and digital media using advanced machine learning algorithms.
moreDetails: Shutterstock AI tools provide powerful editing features such as object removal, background editing, and auto-color correction. The platform allows for precise adjustments to images and video content, using AI to streamline the process.

title: RunwayML Green Screen
description: RunwayML Green Screen is an AI-based tool that removes the background from videos and images in real-time for professional-grade green screen effects.
moreDetails: RunwayML’s Green Screen tool leverages advanced AI to quickly remove backgrounds in videos and images, making it easier for creators to integrate new environments or effects.

title: Deep Dream Generator
description: Deep Dream Generator creates surreal and abstract images using AI that "dreams" up new features based on user input.
moreDetails: Deep Dream Generator uses deep neural networks to transform ordinary images into dream-like, abstract creations. It’s known for producing unique, psychedelic visuals that can be used for artistic expression.

title: Filmora
description: Filmora is a user-friendly video editing software with AI tools that simplify complex editing tasks like color correction, background removal, and more.
moreDetails: Filmora is known for its intuitive interface and AI-powered features, including auto-enhancements, motion tracking, and effects generation, which make video editing easier for beginners and professionals alike.

title: AI Portraits
description: AI Portraits transforms selfies into portraits using AI models that recreate artistic styles or mimic famous painters.
moreDetails: AI Portraits uses neural networks to convert selfies into beautiful portraits, offering a range of classic and modern artistic styles. The platform aims to replicate the look and feel of traditional artwork while maintaining a high degree of realism.

title: Runway Text to Image
description: Runway ML’s Text to Image tool allows users to generate unique images from written descriptions using cutting-edge AI technology.
moreDetails: Runway ML’s Text to Image tool leverages advanced generative models to create realistic and abstract images based on textual prompts. It’s used in content creation, marketing, and other creative fields.

title: Slyce
description: Slyce uses AI to turn your phone into a barcode scanner that reads QR codes, barcodes, and images for fast, efficient information processing.
moreDetails: Slyce is an AI-powered image recognition tool that allows your device to scan and process different types of barcodes, QR codes, and images quickly and accurately.

title: Runway 3D
description: Runway 3D is a tool that uses AI to create and render 3D models based on images and text inputs.
moreDetails: Runway 3D allows users to create 3D models by describing them with text or providing images. The AI-powered platform renders these models in high quality, suitable for use in games, virtual environments, and more.

title: Avatarify
description: Avatarify is an AI tool that allows users to animate static photos or apply facial expressions in real time.
moreDetails: Avatarify uses advanced AI to map facial expressions and movements onto static photos, creating realistic animations of individuals in photos or videos.
